input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Regent Regular-Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Milano Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo Button-Down Collar Gingham Shirt: Red'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Flex Casual Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Bowery Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Bengal Stripe Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Royal Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Performance Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Poplin Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Texture Circle Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stripe Twill Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Shirt'
  - Name='J.crew Slim Fit Bowery Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Mechanical Stretch Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve Plaid Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Untucked-Fit Slim Flex Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Slim Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Slim Plaid Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Slim-Fit Linen-Cotton Dress Shirt with Cutaway Collar'
  - Name='BANANA REPUBLIC Mens NON - IRON Classic Fit Shirt Medium Grey Check Cotton'
  - Name='Banana Republic Slim Fit Wrinkle Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.crew Ludlow Two-ply Easy-care Cotton Dress Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical product: a non-iron dress shirt with added stretch, suitable for similar use and featuring similar construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Regent Regular-Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant; non-iron dress shirt with similar fit options and fabric characteristics, serving the same wardrobe function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Milano Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt with a focus on fit, likely comparable silhouette and use, but lacks explicit non-iron or performance features in the name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo Button-Down Collar Gingham Shirt: Red
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Has non-iron and stretch features, but is an Oxford with a button-down collar (vs. semi-spread), so construction and formal use are somewhat different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares non-iron and stretch qualities, but 'pinpoint Oxford polo' likely has different weave and possibly more casual construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Flex Casual Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While similar in silhouette, this is marketed as a casual Oxford and lacks non-iron designation; less relevant for dressier, formal instantiations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Almost identical in functional features (non-iron, stretch, dress shirt), though Oxford weave is slightly more casual than typical poplin.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Bowery Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free term generally covers non-iron, matches dress shirt function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Bengal Stripe Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt equals high relevancy. Pattern not scored, otherwise construction matches closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Royal Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron, dress shirt; Oxford weave is a minor distinction, but otherwise matches in form and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Performance Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Features non-iron, performance fabric, and dress shirt silhouette. Highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Poplin Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly comparable as a non-iron, poplin weave dress shirt. Function and construction match the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Texture Circle Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron, dress shirt, with a slight difference due to textured weave, but all core elements align.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stripe Twill Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt, relevant construction, only the weave is slightly different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Too vague—unclear about formality, features, or construction relevant to a non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.crew Slim Fit Bowery Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt in a similar fit, though lacking mention of non-iron or performance features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Mechanical Stretch Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mechanical stretch and Oxford shirt construction is somewhat relevant but lacks non-iron and dressier focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve Plaid Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit and long sleeve slightly relevant, but likely a casual shirt lacking non-iron feature and dress shirt tailoring.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Untucked-Fit Slim Flex Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit and flex fabric relate somewhat, but 'untucked' fit and Oxford construction suggest a more casual shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Slim Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant covers non-iron, slim fit, and explicitly a dress shirt. Strongly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Plaid Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt, slim fit, most aspects align except non-iron is not stated.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Slim-Fit Linen-Cotton Dress Shirt with Cutaway Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt with similar fit, but linen-cotton blend and cutaway collar differ in material and collar style from reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BANANA REPUBLIC Mens NON - IRON Classic Fit Shirt Medium Grey Check Cotton
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron, classic fit, dress shirt construction; very close to reference product apart from fit distinction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Slim Fit Wrinkle Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with wrinkle-resistant (non-iron) features; almost identical in use and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.crew Ludlow Two-ply Easy-care Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt construction and easy-care cotton aligns closely, though 'easy-care' may be a lighter wrinkle resistance than full non-iron.
